mapper.insert: insert into t_article_menu (parent_id, title, sorting, remark, create_user_id, update_user_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{parentId}, #{title}, #{sorting}, #{remark}, #{createUserId}, #{updateUserId}, now(), now());
mapper.select: select id, title, parent_id AS parentId, sorting, remark, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime from t_article_menu where id = #{articleMenuId} and delete_status = 0
select id, title, parent_id AS parentId, sorting, remark, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime from t_article_menu where parent_id = #{parentId} and delete_status = 0 order by sorting
select id, title, parent_id AS parentId, sorting, remark, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime from t_article_menu where delete_status = 0 order by sorting

select ta.id, ta.article_menu_id AS articleMenuId, ta.title AS title, ta.sorting AS sorting, ta.url AS url, ta.remark AS remark, ta.create_time AS createTime, ta.update_time AS updateTime from t_article ta where ta.article_menu_id =#{articleMenuId} and ta.delete_status=0 order by ta.sorting DESC ;

select ta.id, ta.article_menu_id AS articleMenuId, ta.title AS title, ta.sorting AS sorting, ta.url AS url, ta.remark AS remark, ta.create_time AS createTime, ta.update_time AS updateTime from t_article ta where ta.article_menu_id =#{articleMenuId} and ta.delete_status=0 order by ta.sorting ;
